MNKD On June 1 2014 MNKD closes at 5480 adjusted 5 years later it is around 115 For imbecilic pumpers like Greekidioso How many big green closes does it take to lose 5375 of 5480 That is 98 of the value it had 5 tears ago The highest pps was June 1 2006 when MNKD trade at 10655 which means that MNKD is trading at around 1 of its value 13 years ago Knowing this it is difficult to give any credibility to anyone who believes that a 2 or 10 cent gain is significant when measured against a 10540 loss sonce 06 Thes e are sadly the real numbers As for Polyester Castagna he has had no measureable effect on MNKD future His noise and bravado have only masked his incompetence He is incapable of marketing Afrezza unable to find a partner and unwilling to step aside for someone who may have the intelligence and experience to to save Mannkind

MNKD remaining debt owed to Deerfiled comes due in July 2019 for 9 million which paid in full will release all liens and collateral pledged by Mannkind on virtually all their assets That will leave 91 million in debt due in 2021 on the balance sheet 19 million in Senior Notes 72 million owed to Mann Group and I expect debt will likely be converted into shares at a conversion price of 515 4 respectively The other debt obligation Mannkind has is to Amphastar for bulk insulin supply that will spike up in 2020 Needless to say the upcoming payment to Deerfield on or before July 2019 freeing up all MNKD assets could be the catalyst for a new partner deal that will hopefully have the partner taking an equity position in MNKD I hope starting in June 2019 thru next Earnings Release in August 2019 a major shiftchange will occur The status quo kicking the can down a very long road that seems to never end will soon remove the can off the road and find a better road forward
